languages.text: {n}Маражай взглядом указывает на источник трапезы Чорды. На его лице появляется заинтригованная ухмылка — ксенос ждет вашей реакции.{/n}
{n}Marazhai looks at Incendia's meal. An intrigued smirk appears on his lips — the xenos is waiting to see your reaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай взглядом указывает на источник трапезы Чорды. На его лице появляется заинтригованная ухмылка — ксенос ждет вашей реакции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Incendia's meal. An intrigued smirk appears on his lips — he is waiting to see your reaction.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看着因森蒂娅勺子里的脑浆，嘴角浮现出一丝好奇的笑意。他正等待着你的反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Incendia's meal. An intrigued smirk appears on his lips — the xenos is waiting to see your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看着因森蒂娅勺子里的脑浆，嘴角浮现出一丝好奇的笑意。他正等待着你的反应。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはインセンディアの食事を見てニヤリと笑った―異種族はあなたの反応を待っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Incendia's meal. An intrigued smirk appears on his lips — the xenos is waiting to see your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはインセンディアの食事を見てニヤリと笑った―異種族はあなたの反応を待っている。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mira la comida de Incendia. Una sonrisa de intriga aparece en sus labios. El xenos está esperando tu reacción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Incendia's meal. An intrigued smirk appears on his lips — the xenos is waiting to see your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mira la comida de Incendia. Una sonrisa de intriga aparece en sus labios. El xenos está esperando tu reacción.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt auf Incendias Mahlzeit. Ein gespanntes Grinsen erscheint auf seinen Lippen — der Xenos wartet auf deine Reaktion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Incendia's meal. An intrigued smirk appears on his lips — the xenos is waiting to see your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt auf Incendias Mahlzeit. Ein gespanntes Grinsen erscheint auf seinen Lippen — der Xenos wartet auf deine Reaktion.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lance un regard au repas d'Incendia. Un sourire intrigué aux lèvres, il attend de voir votre réaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Incendia's meal. An intrigued smirk appears on his lips — the xenos is waiting to see your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lance un regard au repas d'Incendia. Un sourire intrigué aux lèvres, il attend de voir votre réaction.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, İncendia'nın yemeğine bakıyor. Dudaklarında esrarlı bir sırıtış peyda olan zeno, tepkini bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Incendia's meal. An intrigued smirk appears on his lips — the xenos is waiting to see your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, İncendia'nın yemeğine bakıyor. Dudaklarında esrarlı bir sırıtış peyda olan zeno, ne tepki vereceğini gözlemliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
